item.title: Init
item.description: Everything starts with an init. It’s a perfect time to release my new project, Moonshot Engineer, a place where I can share my learnings and my views mostly about tech, startups, software, and data. Root cause One thing I love the most is understanding how people work in their day to day basis. Jump in or starting a new project requires understanding how the project works, whatâ€™s the purpose and goals of it, aligned with the philosophy behind it.
